title: Hyper Chondriac Music
lyrics:
With virtually identical lyrics to ‘Hyper Music’, but devoid of the searing guitar presence, this song paints a much more melancholiac reflection on days gone by.
[Verse 1]
Golden lies feed my role
This forgotten space race under my control
[Pre-Chorus]
Who's returned from the dead?
Who remains?
[Verse 2]
You wanted more than I was worth
You think I was scared, yeah, and you needed proof
[Pre-Chorus]
Who really cares anymore?
Who restrains?
[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus]
Well, I don't love you
And I never did
I don't love you
And I never will
